legal_basis: Sections 96 and 97 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act (IRPA)
credibility_findings: C. Ruiz lacked credibility due to his failure to claim asylum in the U.S. and inconsistencies regarding his passport
evidence_assessment: ignored key evidence, such as his young age and academic records
result_of_case: The court accepted the judicial review, annulled the IRB's decision, and ordered a new hearing with a different panel
refugee_status: C. Ruiz claimed refugee status in Canada
